diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Biliary Obstruction / Head of Pancreas Mass, Constipation, Anemia, Hypothyroidism, Depression
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient had a history of biliary issues; elevated liver function tests (LFTs); findings of a pancreatic head mass and bile duct stricture; and underwent ERCP, which led to acute pancreatitis post-procedure. Clinical symptoms include abdominal discomfort and tenderness, consistent with pancreatitis.
